H0.text: To which poet does Il Postino deliver mail. Federico García Lorca

H1.text: To which poet does Il Postino deliver mail. Gabriel García Márquez

H2.text: To which poet does Il Postino deliver mail. Mario Benedetti

H3.text: To which poet does Il Postino deliver mail. Pablo Neruda

A4.text: The Italian film Il Postino (1994) is a fictional work about a humble man who is hired to deliver mail by bicycle to just one recipient of the island Procida, Neruda, living there in exile.

A5.text: The novel in turn served as the basis for the 1994 film Il Postino as well as the 2010 opera of the same name by Daniel Catán.
